entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
